channel.title: Creations on Vineeth Pothulapati
channel.description: Recent content in Creations on Vineeth Pothulapati

item.title: kubectl mc to manage multiple clusters
item.description: The motive behind this plugin is to manage set of kubernetes clusters with a kubectl plugin. All the kubectl actions can be performed using this plugin. The plugin cascades the performed operation to all the k8s clusters.

item.title: k8s-scaler to create k8s resources at scale
item.description: This project is a kubernetes resource scaler. The main objective of this project is to create 10’s/100’s/100’s of kubernetes resources with ease. Infact by just using a single command.
